text: 17:8 7:7; Bek'. 11:7; Dub. 69:28  Nbek'ts s'ootso shino teshke, and aaliye, ilowere gop' k'oolotse kááron keshetwe, t'afo maants ametuwe, datso bíazeewortson boshúútso kashi mas'afatse guut'eraw datsatse beyirwots, s'ootso shin teshke b́teshi, andi aalo ili weetwo b́wottsok'o bobek'or aditúnee.
